gene.function: FUNCTION: Catalytic subunit of the mRNA-capping methyltransferase RNMT:RAMAC complex that methylates the N7 position of the added guanosine to the 5'-cap structure of mRNAs (PubMed:9790902, PubMed:9705270, PubMed:10347220, PubMed:11114884, PubMed:22099306, PubMed:27422871). Binds RNA containing 5'-terminal GpppC (PubMed:11114884). {ECO:0000269|PubMed:10347220, ECO:0000269|PubMed:11114884, ECO:0000269|PubMed:22099306, ECO:0000269|PubMed:27422871, ECO:0000269|PubMed:9705270, ECO:0000269|PubMed:9790902}.
geneOntologyBiologicalProcess: cellular response to leukemia inhibitory factor [GO:1990830]
